name: Trainsmission
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2018, An explosive train simulator in which you manage a train loaded with explosive people, will you keep them on board, or will blast them off to oblivion. Click switches to change tracks.

Play in your browser here: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/706100

Feel free to join CoolCast's discord server for exclusive content previews, interaction with the developers and more.

https://discord.gg/YTg7Zh5
